bbs.config.appearance.axes_scale-comment: Determines the size of axes, if the axes are too big, you can adjust to your liking
bbs.config.appearance.click_sound-commen: By enabling this option, button clicks will play BBS Studio's custom clicking sound effect
bbs.config.appearance.force_qwerty-comme: For key codes display, force displaying of QWERTY layout instead of currently used layout (like AZERTY, QWERTZ or ЙЦУКЕ)
bbs.config.appearance.fov-comment: This option controls FOV for camera in world menu and animation panel
bbs.config.appearance.freeze_models-comm: When enabled, models in form picker won't follow the mouse
bbs.config.appearance.hsv_color_picker-c: When enabled, this option switches all color pickers to use HSV color model instead of RGB, which is more intuitive
bbs.config.appearance.primary_color-comm: The color which is used everywhere in the GUI system
bbs.config.appearance.title: Appearance
bbs.config.appearance.tooltip: General options regarding the appearance of GUIs and the framework
bbs.config.appearance.tooltip_style-comm: This option allows to change GUI tooltip style
bbs.config.appearance.trackpad_increment: Enable < and > buttons on the trackpad field (which increment the trackpad value)
bbs.config.appearance.trackpad_scrolling: Enable mouse wheel scrolling on trackpad fields to increment/decrement values
bbs.config.appearance.ui_scale-comment: This option scales the appearance of UI elements and HUD by given factor
bbs.config.appearance.uniform_scale-comm: This option forces uniform scaling for transformation fields when all scale coordinates are same
bbs.config.audio.title: Audio
bbs.config.audio.tooltip: Options for in-game audio sync feature
bbs.config.audio.waveform_density-commen: How many pixels of audio waveform should be shown per second
bbs.config.audio.waveform_filename-comme: Whether filename of the played audio in the audio should be shown
bbs.config.audio.waveform_height-comment: Height of an audio bar in pixels
bbs.config.audio.waveform_time-comment: Whether audio track's playback time should be displayed. Keep in mind that audio track's playback time doesn't necessarily represent a scene's current playback time!
bbs.config.audio.waveform_visible-commen: Whether audio bars should be shown when they're playing back
bbs.config.audio.waveform_width-comment: Width of an audio bar in floating point percentage (between 0 and 1)
bbs.config.background.color-comment: Background color to be used in every menu. If image is specified, then this will be used as tinting color for background
bbs.config.background.image-comment: Background image to be used in every menu
bbs.config.background.title: Background
bbs.config.background.tooltip: Background options like color and texture to be used
bbs.config.chroma_sky.enabled-comment: Enables or disables chroma sky, a mechanism that turns the sky in a solid color
bbs.config.chroma_sky.terrain-comment: Whether terrain is rendering when chroma sky is enabled
bbs.config.chroma_sky.title: Chroma sky
bbs.config.dc.title: Damage control
bbs.config.editor.angle_speed-comment: Angle flight speed when rotating the camera around
bbs.config.editor.clip_preview-comment: When enabled, you can see currently selected clip in the keyframe timeline
bbs.config.editor.crosshair-comment: Shows a crosshair in the middle of the camera editor's screen
bbs.config.editor.duration-comment: What is default duration of a camera clip (in ticks)
bbs.config.editor.guides_color-comment: Color that will be used for rule of thirds and center lines (including transparency)
bbs.config.editor.horizontal_clip_editor: Determines whether clip editor's elements will be organized vertically or horizontally
bbs.config.editor.horizontal_flight-comm: When enabled, the pitch of the camera won't affect the movement making the WASD movement cardinal (XZ plane)
bbs.config.editor.jump-comment: By how many ticks do jump keybinds move the timeline's cursor (up and down arrow keybinds)
bbs.config.editor.loop-comment: Loops playback of currently selected clip or looping region (you can use [ and ] keys to select the region, or Alt + click drag on the timeline)
bbs.config.editor.periodic_save-comment: Number of seconds that triggers automatic save repeatedly. To disable periodic saving, set the option to 0
bbs.config.editor.rewind-comment: Whether the playback should be rewound to beginning upon finishing playing the film
bbs.config.editor.seconds-comment: When enabled, this option will use seconds, instead of ticks, for displaying and editing in camera editor
bbs.config.editor.snap_to_markers-commen: When enabled, clip snapping will snap to tick markers
bbs.config.editor.speed-comment: Flight speed when moving the camera around
bbs.config.editor.title: Camera editor
bbs.config.editor.tooltip: Config options which are used within camera editor
bbs.config.entity_selectors.title: Entity selectors
bbs.config.entity_selectors.whitelist-co: A list of entity's NBT keys that are whitelisted to be compared when entity's NBT was changed to reflect changes
bbs.config.model_blocks.click-comment: Whether model blocks can be picked in the model block panel editor by clicking on them
bbs.config.model_blocks.render_all-comme: Whether all model blocks should be rendered
bbs.config.model_blocks.title: Model blocks
bbs.config.multiskin.multithreaded-comme: Allows you to toggle multi-threaded processing of multi-skins, which should fix the lag at cost of longer processing
bbs.config.multiskin.title: Multi-skin
bbs.config.recording.overlays-comment: Whether recording overlays will be displayed (counter, current tick and camera preview will be displayed)
bbs.config.recording.swipe_damage-commen: When swipe action clip gets recorded, insert also an automatic attack action clip
bbs.config.recording.title: Recording
bbs.config.recording.tooltip: Here is everything related to player recording system
bbs.config.scrollbars.sensitivity-commen: Allows you to change the factor of how much faster or slower mouse wheel scrolling
bbs.config.scrollbars.sensitivity_horizo: Allows you to change the factor of how much faster or slower mouse wheel scrolling horizontally
bbs.config.scrollbars.shadow-comment: Allows you to set shadow color of scrollbars
bbs.config.scrollbars.smoothness-comment: Allows you to toggle between smooth and immediate scrolling
bbs.config.scrollbars.title: Scrollbars
bbs.config.scrollbars.tooltip: Background options like color and texture to be used
bbs.config.scrollbars.width-comment: Allows you to setup the thickness (width of scrollbars)
bbs.config.shader_curves.title: Shader curves
bbs.config.title: BBS
bbs.config.tutorials.cursor-comment: Enables rendering of the mouse cursor. It's very useful for tutorials when they're recorded with BBS' video recorder and the cursor isn't visible
bbs.config.tutorials.keystrokes-comment: Enables rendering of the keystrokes. It's very useful for tutorials when to show which keys are being pressed
bbs.config.tutorials.keystrokes_offset-c: Allows to configure how many pixels away from the corner the keystroke line would be drawn
bbs.config.tutorials.keystrokes_position: Allows to change the corner of the keystroke line
bbs.config.tutorials.mouse_buttons-comme: Enables rendering of the mouse button presses and mouse wheel scrolling
bbs.config.tutorials.title: Tutorials options
bbs.config.tutorials.tooltip: This category provides options which are useful for making tutorial videos
bbs.config.video.encoder_path-comment: To record a video, you need to specify here a path to ffmpeg's binary (to ffmpeg or ffmpeg.exe file, depending on OS)
bbs.config.video.log-comment: If disabled, it will not generate the log in the video export folder (instead it will go into BBS mod's settings/video.log)
bbs.config.video.title: Video recording
bbs.config.video.tooltip: This category provides options for recording video in the film editor
bbs.ui.audio_editor.title: Audio editor
bbs.ui.camera.clips.bbs:subtitle: Subtitle
bbs.ui.camera.editor.keys.clips.title: Clips
bbs.ui.camera.editor.keys.editor.title: Camera editor
bbs.ui.camera.editor.keys.looping.title: Looping
bbs.ui.camera.editor.keys.modes.title: Modes
bbs.ui.camera.panels.audio.extend_durati: Extend this clip's duration to the duration of the audio
bbs.ui.camera.panels.context.look_block: Get center block coordinates at cursor
bbs.ui.camera.panels.copy_entity_tooltip: Copy entity's head orientation, exactly like GoPros
bbs.ui.camera.panels.deterministic_toolt: When enabled, deterministic algorithm would be used to calculate reproducible smoothed out camera movement.
bbs.ui.camera.panels.dolly.distance: Distance which determines for how many blocks will dolly travel in given direction during given duration
bbs.ui.camera.panels.dolly.pitch: Vertical direction (pitch, measured in degrees) in which dolly will travel
bbs.ui.camera.panels.dolly.reverse: Switch places beginning end, basically reverse it
bbs.ui.camera.panels.dolly.title: Dolly
bbs.ui.camera.panels.dolly.yaw: Horizontal direction (yaw, measured in degrees) in which dolly will travel
bbs.ui.camera.panels.duration: Clip's duration (measured in ticks, 20 ticks = ~1 second), the number determines for how long the clip will be applied
bbs.ui.camera.panels.envelopes.title: Envelope
bbs.ui.camera.panels.factor_tooltip: Linear factor (between 0 and 1), the smaller the value, the more it will smooth out
bbs.ui.camera.panels.forward_tooltip: This option orients the camera toward the vector of motion, exactly like a roller coaster
bbs.ui.camera.panels.layer: Clip's layer, the number determines the order in which camera's clip behavior will be applied, the higher the number, the later it will be applied
bbs.ui.camera.panels.rate_tooltip: Rate (in frames) at which data should smoothed out per second, the the higher the number, the more intensive calculations are. Only used when deterministic is enabled!
bbs.ui.camera.panels.relative_tooltip: Apply relative animation of the clip or camera profile
bbs.ui.camera.panels.target-tooltip: This clip will target specific actor in the film
bbs.ui.camera.panels.tick: Clip's tick (measured in ticks, 20 ticks = ~1 second), the number determines how far is this clip into the camera work
bbs.ui.camera.panels.title: Title
bbs.ui.camera.panels.title_tooltip: Display name which will be displayed in the timeline
bbs.ui.camera.timeline.cant_fit-notifica: Can't fit a clip right there...
bbs.ui.camera.timeline.context.add_on_to: Add clip on top of selected...
bbs.ui.camera.timeline.context.record_mi: Type in the filename for the recorded audio track:
bbs.ui.camera.timeline.incompatible_past: Pasted data couldn't be read... perhaps it's intended for another type of clip editor?
bbs.ui.config.title: Settings
bbs.ui.dashboard.optifine_ew-description:
IMPORTANT: BBS mod doesn't support Optifine! Optifine may break specific BBS mod features, USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!

As alternative, try installing Sodium and Iris.
bbs.ui.ffmpeg.error-description: ffmpeg wasn't set up, or wasn't found. Either setup the path to ffmpeg in BBS mod's settings or read the guide by clicking ? button.
bbs.ui.film.controller.insert_frame-desc: Pick a keyframe group that you want to insert:
bbs.ui.film.controller.onion_skin.all-de: Enable onion skin for all replays
bbs.ui.film.controller.onion_skin.title: Onion skin
bbs.ui.film.controller.record-descriptio: Pick a keyframe group that you want to record:
bbs.ui.film.controller.server_warning: Player control is disabled on a server that doesn't have BBS mod installed! Use record outside feature for player recording.
bbs.ui.film.insert_space-description: Input how many ticks of emptiness to insert:
bbs.ui.film.move-description: Input relative coordinates to move the scene:
bbs.ui.film.no_camera-description: It appears like you didn't setup the camera. This feature doesn't work without camera. Please setup at least one camera clip in the camera editor!
bbs.ui.film.render_audio.error: Audio clips couldn't be rendered! See the latest.log for more information...
bbs.ui.film.render_audio.success: The audio clips were successfully rendered!
bbs.ui.film.replay.actor-tooltip: When enabled, this replay will be displayed as an entity (meaning you can hit it, it can pick up items, trigger pressure plates, etc.)
bbs.ui.film.replay.animation_to_pose.onl: Instead of baking animations for every tick, when enabled, only in places where there are keyframes poses will be generated... for MoLang powered animations, it's better to disable this option!
bbs.ui.film.replay.label: Replay display name
bbs.ui.film.replay.looping-tooltip: Setting to 0, disables replay's looping. Setting to any positive value, will make the replay loop. Keep in mind that looping doesn't change the duration of the film.
bbs.ui.film.replay.title: Replays
bbs.ui.film.screenshot-description: Your screenshot was successfully taken! Click the icon on the right to open the folder...
bbs.ui.film.teleport-description: It appears that you are too far away from the scene. If you want to teleport to camera, press teleport icon in the right sidebar!
bbs.ui.film.title: Films

bbs.ui.forms.categories.context.export_m: The model was exported to .bbs.json. You can click folder icon on the right to open the folder to which model was generated.
bbs.ui.forms.categories.remove_category-: Are you sure you want to remove this category?
bbs.ui.forms.categories.rename_category-: Type in a new name for this form category:
bbs.ui.forms.categories.shared-notificat: You've been shared a form "%s", see recent forms...

bbs.ui.forms.editor.slim-tooltip: For player mob forms, this toggle lets you switch between slim and wide model formats

bbs.ui.forms.editors.general.lighting-to: Whether lighting is applied to the form like torch light, sky light, time of the day, etc.
bbs.ui.forms.editors.general.movement_sp: This option doesn't change the movement speed of a replay actor. Only for the morphed player!
bbs.ui.forms.editors.general.track_name-: When specified, a special prefix will be displayed in keyframe tracks and attachment picker instead of a path like "0/1/2"

bbs.ui.scene.replays.context.dupe-descri: Input how many times do you want to duplicate this replay:
bbs.ui.scene.replays.context.from_model_: Pick a model block from the list that will be turned into a replay:
bbs.ui.scene.replays.context.offset_time: Input tick shift (math expressions can be used) which will offset currently selected replays time:

Following variables are available:
§ei§r - replay index
§eo§r - relative replay index
bbs.ui.scene.replays.context.paste_keyfr: Input a number by which all keyframes will be randomly shifted after pasting at cursor:
bbs.ui.scene.replays.context.process-des: Input math expression, and select desired channels which will be process all keyframes in selected replays:

§ei§r - replay index

bbs.ui.selectors.title: Entity selectors
bbs.ui.shape_keys.context.name: Name...
bbs.ui.shape_keys.title: Shape keys
bbs.ui.snowstorm.appearance.loop_tooltip: Rewind the animation back to start when it reaches the last (maximum) frame
bbs.ui.snowstorm.appearance.stretch_tool: Stretch texture animation to the lifetime of the particle
bbs.ui.snowstorm.appearance.title: Texture
bbs.ui.snowstorm.collision.bounciness: Bounciness multiplies particle's acceleration after collision
bbs.ui.snowstorm.collision.drag: Collision drag adds a drag (slowdown) after particle's collision with blocks in the world
bbs.ui.snowstorm.collision.title: Collision
bbs.ui.snowstorm.curves.rename_overlay: Type in a new name for this curve's variable. Keep in mind that you'll need to change the old variable names wherever it was used previously...
bbs.ui.snowstorm.curves.title: Curves
bbs.ui.snowstorm.expiration.expression_t: This expression keeps the particle alive until the expression's result is a zero
bbs.ui.snowstorm.expiration.kill_plane_t: You can specify a plane in terms of Ax + By + Cz + D = 0, if a particle crosses this plane, then it expires
bbs.ui.snowstorm.expiration.max_tooltip: This expression defines the particle's lifetime (in terms of seconds)
bbs.ui.snowstorm.expiration.title: Particle's lifetime
bbs.ui.snowstorm.general.identifier: This particle effect's display name which is displayed in the form list menu
bbs.ui.snowstorm.general.title: General
bbs.ui.snowstorm.initialization.creation: Creation expression, it runs when emitter starts
bbs.ui.snowstorm.initialization.title: Initialization expressions
bbs.ui.snowstorm.initialization.update_t: Update expression, it runs every tick
bbs.ui.snowstorm.lifetime.active_express: Expression that is responsible for restarting the emitter, if the evaluated result is a non-zero
bbs.ui.snowstorm.lifetime.active_looping: Expression that determines for how long a single cycle will be active before a sleeping phase
bbs.ui.snowstorm.lifetime.active_once: Expression that determines for how long this single cycle lasts
bbs.ui.snowstorm.lifetime.expiration_exp: Expression that is responsible for stopping the emitter, if the evaluated result is a non-zero
bbs.ui.snowstorm.lifetime.sleep_time: Expression that determines for how long emitter will be sleeping before the next cycle
bbs.ui.snowstorm.lifetime.title: Emitter's lifetime
bbs.ui.snowstorm.lighting.title: Color and lighting
bbs.ui.snowstorm.motion.title: Motion
bbs.ui.snowstorm.rate.max_particles: How many particles at the same time will be present
bbs.ui.snowstorm.rate.particles: How many particles will get emitted at once
bbs.ui.snowstorm.rate.spawn_rate: Spawn rate expression determines how many particles in a second will be emitted
bbs.ui.snowstorm.rate.title: Spawn rate
bbs.ui.snowstorm.shape.surface_tooltip: Spawn particles around the surface of the shape
bbs.ui.snowstorm.shape.title: Emitter's shape
bbs.ui.snowstorm.space.title: Particle space
bbs.ui.snowstorm.title: Particles
bbs.ui.state_triggers.rmb_here: Right click here to add a state trigger...

bbs.ui.supporters.call_to_action: If you would like to support BBS mod financially, consider donating me on Patreon!
bbs.ui.supporters.gratitude: BBS mod is possible thanks to generous donations of my fans!
bbs.ui.supporters.intro: Hello there! My name is McHorse, and thank you for downloading BBS mod! If you're new to BBS mod, check out following resources!
bbs.ui.supporters.title: Supporters
bbs.ui.texture.editor.auto_size_tooltip: When enabled, it will use the texture's original size, otherwise a custom size is provided below.
bbs.ui.texture.editor.color: With this color element, you can adjust color (RGB) channels. It works best with white/grayscale images.
bbs.ui.texture.editor.erase_tooltip: This feature allows using a current skin as a difference mask, meaning, any opaque pixels will erase pixels of all skins underneath it.
bbs.ui.texture.url_error_ffmpeg: URL "%s" couldn't be downloaded because ffmpeg isn't installed...
bbs.ui.texture.url_error_http: URL "%s" couldn't be downloaded due to HTTP error...
bbs.ui.textures.copy: Copy texture's path to copy-paste buffer
bbs.ui.textures.discard-description: You edited this texture. Are you sure you want to switch to another one? Switching to another texture will discard any changes...
bbs.ui.textures.download-description: Input the URL to the texture you want to download:
bbs.ui.textures.export_frames-tooltip: This tool allows you to extract frames from a vertical/horizontal texture atlas as separate frames
bbs.ui.textures.export_overlay.error: Something went wrong when exporting a %s texture... more details are in the log (you might want to contact the developer).
bbs.ui.textures.export_overlay.success: Selected texture %s was successfully exported! Would you like to open its folder?
bbs.ui.textures.export_overlay.title: Export texture
bbs.ui.textures.resize-description: Enter new resolution for this texture:
bbs.ui.textures.save: Specify the path to the texture in the textbox below:
bbs.ui.textures.save_wrong_path: Texture has to be saved as .png and into assets (it has to start with "assets:") folder!
bbs.ui.textures.title: Textures
bbs.ui.textures.viewer.brightness: This slider controls the brightness of the checkered background pattern
bbs.ui.video_settings.held_frames-toolti: Increase if you need to stabilize picture of accumulative shaders (like RT or PT)
bbs.ui.video_settings.motion_blur-toolti: The bigger the number, the better quality of motion blur, but also the longer it will take to record
bbs.ui.video_settings.title: Video export settings

studio.ui.language.editor.missing: Display only the missing (not translated) strings
studio.ui.language.editor.paste-descript: Paste JSON which will replace current language strings. §5IMPORTANT§r: make a back up just in case, as given JSON §imight§r replace your work.
